Method.name: ConvertToProxyObject
Method.Implementation:
set proxy = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set proxy.id = ..%Id() set proxy.selfLink = "http://"_##class(Settings).GetWebAppDomain()_##class(Settings).GetWebAppAdmin()_"/competition/"_..%Id() set proxy.tournament = ..Tournament.ConvertToProxyObject() set proxy.country = ..Country.Name set proxy.location = ..Location set proxy.discipline = ..Discipline.Name set proxy.ageGroup = ..AgeGroup.Name set proxy.division = ..Division.Name set proxy.status = ..CStatus.Name set proxy.type = ..Type.Name set proxy.date = $ZD(..StartDate, 3) set proxy.lastSyncWDSF = ..LastSyncWDSF set proxy.lastModifiedWDSF = ..WDSFLastModified set proxy.isSolo = ..IsSolo
quit proxy

Method.name: Save
SyncWDSF
Method.Implementation:
set st = $$$OK
set currTS = $ZDT($ZTS, 3) set timeDiff = ""
&sql(SELECT {fn TIMESTAMPDIFF(SQL_TSI_MINUTE, LastSyncWDSF, :currTS)} As TimeDiff INTO :timeDiff FROM WC_Data.Competition WHERE WDSFId = :wdsfId)
if (timeDiff < syncTimeOutMinutes) && (..%ExistsId(wdsfId) = $$$YES){ quit ..%OpenId(wdsfId,,.st) }
set wdsfData = ##class(WC.Wdsf.API).GetCompetitionById(wdsfId, .st) $$$THROWONERROR(st, st)
set cmpData = ##class(%ZEN.proxyObject).%New() set cmpData.id = wdsfId set cmpData.WDSFId = wdsfData.id set cmpData.WDSFGroupId = wdsfData.groupId set cmpData.WDSFEventId = wdsfData.eventId set cmpData.country = wdsfData.country set cmpData.discipline = wdsfData.discipline set cmpData.division = wdsfData.division set cmpData.status = wdsfData.status set cmpData.type = wdsfData.type set cmpData.ageGroup = wdsfData.age set cmpData.location = wdsfData.location set cmpData.coefficient = wdsfData.coefficient set cmpData.startDate = $P(wdsfData.date, "T", 1) set cmpData.lastModifiedDate = $REPLACE(wdsfData.lastmodifiedDate, "T", " ") set cmpData.LastSyncWDSF = $ZDT($ZTS, 3)
quit ..Save(cmpData, .st)

Method.name: GetIsSolo
